latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Public Knowledge, Attitude and Perception on Rice Biotechnology Research in the Philippines

dsDescriptionValue.value: The study conducted pulse surveys among rice biotechnology stakeholders with the aim of measuring the level of public awareness of rice biotechnology; determining the attitude and perception of the key persons in research institution, universities, mass media, religious groups, farmer groups and other public and private organizations and draw some policy recommendations on awareness of rice biotechnology and commercialization of its products.

fields.value: Subject: Survey questionnaires  Type: Mailed  Notes: 221; Subject: group of students from Universities in Manila and Central Luzon  Type: Stakeholders  Notes: 271;
